text: GOD never burdens soul its ZNAMENAT its credit bol CO it ZARABAT against bol CO it commits Our Lord nie condemn us my zabudnut robit zamenit! Our Lord chranit us z blaspheming Ona mat rad those before us robit! Our Lord chranit us z zhresit it becomes i noskorsie us repent Pardon us forgive us! Ona bol our Lord Zvladnut Grant us victory disbelieving ludia
